docs.lead_paragraph: If David Carl as Gary Busey as Hamlet is not exponential enough, the New York Shakespeare Exchange is offering “Hamlet” to the 10th power.
docs.abstract: Neil Genzlinger Critic's Notebook looks at reinterpretations of Shakespeare's Hamlet in plays Hamlet10 and Gary Busey’s One-Man Hamlet as Performed by David Carl.

headline.main: If You Want to Make a ‘Hamlet,’ You Have to Break Some Rules

docs.lead_paragraph: Victims of the attacks on Brussels' airport and subway included commuters heading to work and travelers setting off on long-anticipated vacations.
